## ‚ö†Ô∏è This Repository Does NOT Accept Contributions

This issue template exists to make it clear: **this is not an open source project.**

### What This Repository Is

This is **proprietary software** made available in source-visible form for:
- Security auditing and transparency
- Educational review (viewing only)
- User trust and accountability

### What You CANNOT Do

You may NOT:
- ‚ùå Submit feature requests
- ‚ùå Submit bug fixes via pull request
- ‚ùå Contribute code or documentation
- ‚ùå Fork for development purposes
- ‚ùå Use this code in other projects

### License

This software is licensed under a **Proprietary Source-Available License**.

See: [LICENSE](https://github.com/cleveland-lewis/Itori/blob/main/LICENSE)

All rights reserved. No permission is granted to use, modify, or distribute this software.
